helptext:
Hello! I'm ChimechoBot. I have the following commands:
.createQ - Makes a Queue. Queues are owned by their creator and are on a per-channel basis.
.deleteQ - Deletes the Queue in its entirety and frees the channel for more Queues.
.closeQ - Disallows more users from joining. Automatically deletes the Queue when the Queue is empty.
.openQ - Reopens a Queue for further joins if used before the Queue is deleted.
.join - Join the Queue if you aren't in the queue already.
.viewQ - Sends the Queue owner a list of who is in the queue.
.next - Sends the owner and the next 3 people in the Queue (random) codes to connect with. Usable from DM after the first .next.
.add - Sends the next in Queue the same code as the last group. Command usable from DM.
.leave - Leave the Queue.
.configureQ - Configures the Queue. Requires arguments. Use ".configureQ help" for more information.
.save - Saves your current configuration for use in future Queues.
.ring - Opens a new Queue using your saved settings if available.
.numQ - Displays your position in the Queue.
.help - Displays this menu.
helptextown:
Hello! I'm ChimechoBot. I have the following commands available for Queue owners:
.deleteQ - Deletes the Queue in its entirety and frees the channel for more Queues.
.closeQ - Disallows more users from joining. Automatically deletes the Queue when the Queue is empty.
.openQ - Reopens a Queue for further joins if used before the Queue is deleted.
.viewQ - Sends you a list of who is in the queue.
.next - Sends you and the next 3 people in the Queue (random) codes to connect with. Usable from DM after the first .next.
.add - Sends the next in Queue the same code as the last group. Command usable from DM.
.configureQ - Configures the Queue. Requires arguments. Use ".configureQ help" for more information.
.save - Saves your current configuration for use in future Queues.
.up - Sends a messsage to the channel that the room is available to join. Only usable via DM.
.help - Displays this menu.
helptextjoiner:
Hello! I'm ChimechoBot. I have the following commands:
.join - Join the Queue if you aren't in the queue already.
.leave - Leave the Queue.
.numQ - Displays your position in the Queue.
.help - Displays this menu.
configurehelptext:
.configureQ supports the following options:
lobbysize <number> - Change the number of people per lobby.
obbies <number> - Set a max number of lobbies. Automatically closes queue when last lobby is filled and clears queue when last lobby is called via next.
openlobby - Removes the max lobby restriction set by lobbies.
help - Displays this menu.
